scripts.build: npm run build-wasm && npm run build-ts
scripts.build-all: npm run gen-wasm-header && npm run build-wasm && npm run build-ts
scripts.test-wasm: tsc && yarn run copy-wasm && node --no-warnings --experimental-modules --es-module-specifier-resolution=node dist/tests/test-wasm.js
scripts.copy-wasm: shx mkdir -p s dist/wasm/src && shx cp -f wasm/dist/inditrans.mjs dist/wasm/src/ && shx cp -f wasm/src/inditrans.d.ts dist/wasm/src/
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run build-all
